title: Primary health care: a team approach
creator_credit: NBC Films, Robert Kruger, Pierre Henfrey and Ray Poole
brief_description: A film showing the health care provided in the Lisson Grove Health Centre, opened in 1978. Shows doctors, ward sisters, and district nurses at work and the value of having various health care workers under the same roof to make team work easier.
creator_credit_for_label: NBC Films, Robert Kruger, Pierre Henfrey and Ray Poole
